name: East River Ventures
overview: East River Ventures, L.P. is a venture capital firm specializing in investments in early stage companies in the first institutional phase. The firm seeks to invest in the information technology, business services, and healthcare sectors. Within the information technology sector, it prefers to invest in enabling technology, e-commerce, enterprise software and data storage systems, system architecture, communications, media, software, internet infrastructure and services, and information technology and data management services. Within the business services sector, the firm invests in business to business, information technology outsourcing, and professional services. Within the healthcare sector, it invests in internet technology and information technology services, healthcare services, and medical devices. East River Ventures, L.P. is based in New York, New York.
